Vendor Portal

The objective is to understand the functionalities of Material Management(MM) and Finance(FI) module.

Request for quotation

It is a form of invitation that is sent to the vendors to submit a quotation indicating their pricing and terms and conditions.

Purchase order

It is an official document issued by a buyer committing to pay the seller for the sale of specific products or services to be delivered in the future.

Goods receipt

It refers to the physical movement of goods into the warehouse from external vendors. It always increases the stock of goods in your warehouse.

Payment and Aging

The Vendor aging report displays the balances that are due to vendors, sorted by date interval or by aging period definition.

Credit and Debit memos

A debit is a transaction that reduces Amounts Payable to a vendor or that reduces Amounts Receivable from a customer is a credit.

Invoice details

Invoice is a document which holds the amount to be paid back to the vendor. It was developed using SAP iRPA/Automation.
